runs.comm: poor start as he bowls this one on the pads and Mukhtar gets off the mark with a neat flick through backward square leg
back of length outside off, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch
doesn't get hold of this but manages to chip it just over mid-off. He was looking to hit it straight down the ground but it doesn't come off the middle
this is straight off the middle! Tinashe bowls a harmless length delivery but Mukhtar powers it over mid-on with a smooth swing of the bat
bowls an offcutter and hits the pad as the batsman misses a flick but that was always going down leg
stands tall and punches the length delivery to wide mid-off for a single
back of length delivery on off stump, Mukhtar punches it to wide mid-on for a single
fuller and a bit wide outside off, Shehzad lets it go through to the keeper
straighter this time and Shehzad was waiting for it, flicks it neatly to deep midwicket for a single
looks to smash it down the ground without moving his feet, but gets beaten by the angle of Vitori's delivery, just misses the outside edge
on the middle-stump line, the batsman pushes it wide of mid-on for a quick couple
back of length and just outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and defends it to point
poor delivery to start with! This is drifting down the leg side and even though the batsman misses the flick, it skims the thigh pad and runs down to the fine-leg boundary
on the pads again, now they take another leg bye to square leg
poor delivery! He sent the long-on back but serves up a short and wide delivery outside off. The third-man was in and all Mukhtar had to do was to cut it over the infield. That races to the boundary
short again! This is hammered through backward square leg for another boundary. The man at deep square leg had no chance
he makes it a hat-trick of fours! Length delivery but the line is on the middle and leg, Mukhtar loves it there, flicks it through backward square leg again
make it four! Mpofu delivers a gentle length ball and Mukhtar clobbers it over midwicket for another boundary.
it was beautifully driven back down the pitch but Vitori gets a hand to it, slows it down to mid-on
slower delivery wide outside off, Mukhtar looks to hit it over cover but misses it
slower ball again, this time the batsman pushes it straight to cover
short delivery but lacks sting! That has been smashes with a powerful pull through midwicket. The man in the deep is stationed at deep square leg but none of the pulls have gone in his direction
fuller now! Mukhtar is in some mood today. He doesn't move his feet but just throws his bat at that, powerfully hit down the ground over the bowler's head

four more! This one surprised the batsman as it was quite pacy. That rose towards the batsman's throat. Mukhtar was slow on it, but that took the top edge, hit the helmet and ran away to the fine-leg boundary
tossed up outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover
now Shehzad joins in, comes down the pitch and hammers this length delivery over mid-off
comes down the pitch, looks like he is beaten in the flight, but goes through the shot anyway. That has come right of the middle and travels a long way over the boundary at long-off
fires this one on the blockhole, the batsman jams his bat down at that in time
attempts another yorker, this time it's clipped to deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, flicked straight to square leg
full and slower, the batsman pushes it through mid-on for a single
another slower delivery on off, Mukhtar picks up a single to mid-off
that almost travels for a six! It's full and it lacks pace, Shehzad easily picks that up and hammers it over midwicket
he calls for a quick single to cover with a dab off the front foot
short and down the leg side, all the batsman has to do is get some bat on it. He pulls and slaps it over short fine-leg
gets his yorker right and Mukhtar can only dig it out to midwicket
flatter and on the stumps, the batsman punches it to deep point off the back foot
goes back and nudges the flatter delivery to square leg
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
bowls this one with a round-arm action, the batsman eases it to long-off for a single
stays in the crease and pushes the flatter delivery to deep cover
superbly played! He waits and then runs this one down to the third-man boundary with a delicate little late cut
he takes on the long-off fielder and plays that well enough to clear the man! Smashes the tossed up delivery for a six to bring up his half-century. What an innings. Matches the occasion
looks to cut the flatter one but gets beaten
quicker one on the pads, the batsman stays back and punches it to long on
full and flighted, the batsman leans forward and pushes it back to the bowler
poor delivery outside off. It's short and gives room to the batsman. Shehzad punches it off the back foot and picks up a couple to deep point
comes forward and flicks it through midwicket for a single
looks to play the reverse sweep and hits it straight to point
goes back and punches the flatter delivery to long on
he stays low and sweeps it to deep backward square leg for a single
slower and shorter on leg stump line, the batsman drags it to deep midwicket for a single
makes room and places this cut shot really well. Somehow generates the timing to send this scurrying through point and all the way to the boundary
shuffles across and swats this one to deep backward square leg
he comes forward and pushes this one to long-off, then walks the single
allows it to spin away, then punches it to deep cover for a single that brings up the century of the partnership. The two get together for a quick shake of hands
comes down the pitch and gets some outside edge towards deep point. They come back for the second by the time the fielder gets to it
he leans into this tossed up delivery and just punches it inside out, that lands just short of the boundary but slows down for the fielders to come around
comes down the pitch and punches this one down to long on
now Mukhtar goes inside out and does better than Shehzad, this just lands short of the boundary but the fielders had no chance
tossed up wide outside off, punched firmly to deep cover
flatter on the pads, tucked away to the left of short fine leg for a single
makes room and drives this one powerfully over cover, but there is protection in the deep for that shot
that has gone a long way! He skipped down the track and hammered it with lots of power.. It lands behind the dugouts at long on
comes down the pitch and looks for the boundary at wide long-off, but the fielder at long off runs to his right and keeps it in
no one is going to stop this one! Shehzad is superbly in control of this hit. He comes down the pitch and punches it straight down the ground. Just showing it the full face.
fuller delivery on off, the batsman punches it to cover, but good effort by the fielder saves some runs
full and wide outside off, the batsman reaches for it and carves it to deep cover
back of length and a touch slower, the batsman defends it back down the pitch
digs this one short but Shehzad sways out of line
poor again from Vitori. This is full and on the pads, the batsman easily flicks it to the fine-leg boundary and picks up his half-century as well. A good homecoming for him, this.
pushes this fuller one to mid-off for a quick single
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to deep square leg for a single
short and wide, the batsman misses out as he mistimes his cut towards cover
back of length outside off, the batsman stands tall and punches it to mid-off
he missed out two balls ago but not this time, punches the back of the length delivery powerfully through cover
wow! That is neither full nor short! He just stands in his crease and picks it up straight over the bowler's head and that has travelled all the way. What a shot that is
misses out on this short one as this just flies over his bat as he looks to pull
looks to paddle this one but it turns and hits him on the chest
goes back and punches this one to deep midwicket for a couple

what a soft dismissal! Shehzad gives himself room, the bowler pushes it wide outside off and as he reaches out for it, he can only cut it straight to point. End of a good innings from Shehzad. So the opening stand ends at 142, joint equal with Kamran Akmal and Salman Butt's
comes forward and defends this solidly down the pitch
looks to flick it to the leg side but this one slips between bat and pad and somehow misses the off stump
it's a lecture on some other subject probably. Hafeez sweeps it straight to short fine leg
bowls the topspinner, the batsman gets an inside edge on to his pads
short on off stump, Mukhtar goes deep in the crease and drags it powerfully to wide long on
lots of turn for the bowler, but Prof nudges it to square leg, playing against the turn
he has holed out at long on! Mukhtar was looking for another six and gets a decent connection, but this is hit straight to the man. Superb innings from the batsman, in only his second T20I
tossed up on off, the batsman defends it solidly to off
nice lines from Cremer! This is flighted wide outside off, the batsman defends it to the off
poor delivery from Williams! This is tossed up but well down the leg side, Hafeez gets on top of that and paddles it fine
Oh what a Hafeez! He has had enough. He comes down the pitch and smashes it over long-on with a huge huge hit
goes down on his knee and sweeps it to deep backward square leg
full and outside off, the batsman eases it to long off for a single
looks to cut it late but plays it straight to short third man
now goes for the sweep but is beaten as this bounces extra and hits the top of front pad
nicely tossed up, the batsman stays back and defends it to cover
more flight from Cremer, Malik defends
comes down the pitch, but has to pad it away as he realises he is not to the pitch of the delivery
lots of respect from Hafeez as well as he defends it to off
and the lecture is over! Hafeez looks to play the late cut but the extra bounce means he can only edge it to the gloves of Coventry. Will Pakistan get to cheer for Lala?
he gets off the mark with a powerful pull to the cow corner boundary. It was short and was asking to be hit
comes forward and punches this beautifully, but hit straight to mid-off
leans into the length delivery and pushes it to cover thist ime
little width provided and Malik slides it to third man for a single
back of length delivery on off, Umar hops on the crease and defends it to point
Zimbabwe are loving this! Umar Akmal closes the face of his bat a bit too early and sends the leading edge straight to cover. This are gifts being given to Zimbabwe and they are lapping them all up
length delivery on off, defended to mid-off
length delivery on off, the batsman makes room and chops it down to third man
fuller on the pads, the batsman gets an inside edge towards square leg. Had he missed, he would have been plumb lbw
poor delivery at this stage, it's down the leg side. Luckily for Mpofu, it flicks the pads on way to the keeper
looks to work away this length delivery to the leg side, but gets an inside edge on to his pads. The ball rolls behind the stumps and the two take a quick single
looks to clobber this length delivery down the ground, but gets completely beaten by the pace. Ends up chopping it on the pitch
he has missed a full toss! All Malik can do is inside edge it on to his pads. If games were won with inside edges, Pakistan would have cruised in this over.
superb yorker! But the batsman get back for a couple as this one is pushed in the gap at wide long-on

he has got him! What a yorker is that! Malik's laboured innings comes to an end. He swings across the line but this one is too good, squeezes under the bat and hits the middle stump. What a time to bowl that delivery! Well done Panyangara
Lala doesn't like dramas! He smashes the low full toss over the bowler's head and finishes the job
